title: Ticket #7559: Record collector host in the machine ad
description:
For CHTC monitoring, we'd like to be able to clearly identify the 'primary pool' for a given resource where a job ran.

Currently, the default STARTD_ATTRS is set to COLLECTOR_HOST_STRING; the latter defaults to "$(COLLECTOR_HOST)".

This appears fairly brittle - if an admin tries to use STARTD_ATTRS, I suspect they will clobber this. It appears much easier to just make this a first class attribute in the machine's ClassAd.
